user.title: Ezetrol Touch Setup
user.description:
Enter the IP address of your Ezetrol Touch device (e.g., 192.168.1.235).

Set the scan interval (in seconds) to define how often pool data (chlorine, pH, temperature) is updated. For example, 300 seconds is 5 minutes. Do not set below 60 seconds to avoid system instability.

data_description.ip_address: The IP address of your Ezetrol Touch device on your local network.
data_description.scan_interval: The interval in seconds between updates of pool data (e.g., 300 for 5 minutes). Do not set below 60 seconds to avoid system instability.

error.invalid_ip: Please enter a valid IP address.
error.invalid_scan_interval: Scan interval must be at least 60 seconds.
